name: Candy Defense 2023
description:
CANDY DEFENSE

It's Halloween, and you just got the best haul of your trick-or-treating career, but some of those other kids want to take what isn't theirs. Before you can enjoy your prize, you have to defend it  from waves of other trick-or-treaters. Using your trusty dart blaster, you have to fend them off before it’s too late.

CONTROLS

Move - WASD/Arrow Keys

Nerf Machine Gun - 1

Nerf Pistol - 2

Nerf Grenade Launcher - 3

Fire - Left Mouse Button

CREDITS

Luca S - Producer/Game Director

Preston C - Tech Lead/Partial Producer

Connor W - Game Design Lead/Sound Design Lead

Carson L - Art Lead/Partial Tech Lead/Partial Game Director
